text:
Hello All,
I am working on HubSpot forms.
I am facing problem with form fields validation.
Can anyone help me to apply validation that accepts only numbers to my field on form.

<@U01QVR44MEY> Hi, hope well just a quick question.
curl --location ‘<https://api.hubapi.com/oauth/v1/token>’ --header ‘Content-Type:application/json’ --data ‘{
        “grant_type”: “authorization_code”,
        “client_id”: “xxx”,
        “client_secret”: “xxxx”,
        “redirect_uri”: “<http://localhost>”,
        “code”: “xxx”

}’
 I am getting error 415

It's going to look more like this:
```curl --location '<https://api.hubapi.com/oauth/v1/token>' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
        "grant_type": "authorization_code",
        "client_id": "xxx",
        "client_secret": "xxxx",
        "redirect_uri": "<http://localhost>",
        "code": "xxx"
}'```
